channel.title: flower on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in flower on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Lalbagh Flower Show'10
item.description: Finally went to Lalbagh flower show last weekend (8th Aug). Thanks to my work; was awake from 3 AM and had no trouble of getting ready early on Sunday. By 8:40 AM we reached; crowd just started to show-up there was not much problem of parking and all. As soon after we entered the main glass-house Aarush started to sneeze incessantly. Among many varieties of flower main attraction was off course the huge structure of India Gate made of roses; it was tribute to soldiers who lost their lives during the Second World war.
